name: Ahava
description: Cosmetics company that sources materials from the Dead Sea in occupied territories.
reasons: Sources minerals from the occupied shores of the Dead Sea in the West Bank in violation of international law
Operates a manufacturing facility in the illegal settlement of Mitzpe Shalem in the occupied West Bank
Mislabels products as 'Made in Israel' despite being produced in occupied Palestinian territory

name: L'Oréal
description: Beauty company with manufacturing and R&D facilities in Israel.
reasons: Operates manufacturing and research facilities in Migdal Ha'emek in northern Israel, built on the land of the Palestinian village of al-Mujaydil
Acquired Israeli beauty technology companies including those that benefit from occupation infrastructure
Continues to expand operations in Israel despite international calls for divestment due to human rights concerns
